hints.hint: They say that #30 auriferous arachnids# lead to #explosives#.
They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.
They say that a #Bombchu merchant# sells #some rupees#.
They say that a #trio of scrubs# sells #a magic arrow#.
They say that #the goddess of the sand# hoards #explosives#.
They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your car's extended warranty.
They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.
They say that #a token of recognition# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.
Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.
They say that a #spider buried outside a cavern# holds #a projectile#.

hint.location: KF Deku Tree Left Gossip Stone

hints.hint: They say that on top of an #arch of stone# lies #a dungeon map#.

hint.location: KF Deku Tree Right Gossip Stone

hints.hint: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #some rupees#.
They say that #a prize of the House of Skulltulas# can be found at #the Market#.
They say that the #bovine bounty of a horseback hustle# gifts #something sometimes buried#.
They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.
They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.
They say that #40 bug badges# rewards #something kept by the royal family#.
They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.
They say that showing a #truthful eye to the crowd# rewards #some rupees#.
They say that #a vast lake# hoards #a projectile#.
They say that #deep in the forest#, Saria teaches #something sometimes buried#.
They say that #something that can stun# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.
They say that the #froggy finale# yields #some rupees#.
They say that a #nether dweller in the Shadow Temple# holds #something with a strange smell#.
They say that #a shadow's prison# is on the way of the hero.
They say that #something that can remove boulders# can be found at #Haunted Wasteland#.
They say that #something heart-shaped# can be found at #Goron City#.
They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.
They say that #ghost hunters# will be rewarded with #a compass#.
They say that #50 auriferous arachnids# lead to #a boss key#.
They say that #near a dragon# is #some rupees#.
They say that #a Great Fairy's power# can be found at #the Market#.
They say that #explosives# can be found at #Goron City#.
They say that a spider in the #hall of a knight# guards #some rupees#.
They say that #Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.
They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #something heart-shaped#.
They say that #a high mountain# hoards #a compass#.
They say that #a trade quest item# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #something sometimes buried#.
